original: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma’i sgrub thabs

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas zla ba la yi ge bh'um dkar pos bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma dkar mo zhal gsum spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas zla ba la yi ge bh'um dkar pos bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma dkar mo zhal gsum spyan gsum ma /
translated: By the previously explained process, one should imagine the Blessed Lady generated from a white bhrūṃ on a moon, white, with three faces and three eyes,

original: gzhon nu ma lang tshol bab pa /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma lang tshol bab pa /
translated: a youthful maiden in the prime of life,

original: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyag brgyad ma bsam par bya pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyag brgyad ma bsam par bya pa'o //
translated: with eight arms, and endowed with all the ornaments.

original: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni ser mo dang nag mo'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni ser mo dang nag mo'o //
translated: The right and left faces are yellow and black.

original: g-yas kyi phyag bzhin ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang / padma la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mda' bsnams pa dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag bzhin ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang / padma la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mda' bsnams pa dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The four right hands hold a crossed vajra, a buddha seated on a lotus, an arrow, and the boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi na ni gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag gis bum pa gang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi na ni gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag gis bum pa gang ba'o //
translated: In the four left hands are a bow, a threatening forefinger, a noose, and a full vase in the gesture of giving fearlessness.

original: mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs pa ste /🔽dbu rgyan la rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa nges par rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs pa ste / dbu rgyan la rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa nges par rdzogs par byas la /
translated: He is seated inside a stupa.🔽Vairocana is on his crown.

original: rang gi sa bon padma la gnas pa snying gar bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa bon padma la gnas pa snying gar bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: One should visualize his seed syllable on a lotus at the heart.

original: de'i rjes la spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang / dpral ba dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du h'um tr'am hr'i:aam a'a:zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga po 'di blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang / dpral ba dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du h'um tr'am hr'i:aam a'a:zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga po 'di blta bar bya ba'o //
translated: After that, one should visualize the five syllables hūṃ, traṃ, hrīḥ, aṃ, and āḥ on the crown, throat, forehead, navel, and feet, respectively.

original: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ba ni /
translated: Then, one should recite the mantra:

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs so /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs so /
translated: This is the sādhana of Uṣṇīṣavijayā.

original: // / aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong @14a * //
analyzed: // / aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong @14a * //

original: tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
